title: Searching for Flex Team / Teammates | Plat 2+
body:
Hello Guys, 

My Name is **Marc** and i am a **Diamond** IV Player from **Germany**.

I mainly play **ADC** and feel most comftable on it but im very flexible and can therefore also play **jungle** or **toplane**.
I am serching for a team that it interested in playing flex and rank up in it, maybe also participate in some tournaments.

I am also a graphic designer and could definatly create team logos or similar things that might be needed.

Just add me ingame, I can use Discord and Teamspeak.

Best Regards,
Marc
